features: CETAPHIL BODY MOISTURIZING LOTION FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Lightweight, fast absorbing, non-greasy body lotion that's ideal for use on the entire body
INSTANTLY SOOTHES AND PROVIDES 48 HOUR HYDRATION: Immediately boosts skin hydration and continues to strengthen skin moisture barrier throughout the day
NEW AND IMPROVED INGREDIENT BLEND: Now with hydrating glycerin and skin essential vitamins B5 (panthenol) and B3 (niacinamide)
DEVELOPED FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: The hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic formula is free of fragrances, parabens and sulfates
body.description: Find skin care that works for you with CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion, a lightweight and fast absorbing moisturizer designed to comfort and hydrate all skin types. The unique formulation of skin essential vitamin E and 6 moisturizing ingredients provides instant lightweight hydration that leaves skin soft and smooth. And now formulated with a new blend of key ingredients: hydrating glycerin, panthenol (vitamin B5) to hydrate, soothe and preserve the skin barrier, and niacinamide (vitamin B3) to help smooth skin texture and retain skin moisture barrier. Water binding agents deeply replenish the skins moisture and prevent moisture loss, providing long lasting 48 hour hydration that completely restores the skins moisture barrier in one week, helping to defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity. Fragrance free, lanolin free, paraben free and sulfate free, this gentle lotion is clinically tested for even the most sensitive skin. Treat your skin right thanks to the gentle, non-comedogenic formula, providing instant, everyday moisturizing care that leaves skin immediately feeling soft, smooth and replenished.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get healthier looking skin that feels nourished and soothed. CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion is a fast absorbing, lightweight formula that provides instant and lasting hydration. Skin is immediately replenished and the formula is clinically proven to improve the skin’s natural moisture barrier in 1 day and completely restore the barrier in one week. Formulated with our new ingredient blend of niacinamide (vitamin B3), panthenol (vitamin B5) and hydrating glycerin. This improved formula helps to preserve the skin's moisture barrier, improve water retention, soothe the skin, and improve the overall quality of sensitive skin. This hypoallergenic formula is fragrance free and paraben free, clinically proven to be gentle enough for the most sensitive skin. This unique formula is enriched with avocado oil as well as skin essential vitamins E, B3 and B5 to provide 48 hours of continuous hydration. It works fast to immediately replenish the skin, and 94% of users agree that skin feels fully hydrated after use. CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion delivers targeted moisturization where it is needed, to leave your skin feeling softer and smoother. Tackle sensitive skin with the help of CETAPHIL. A weakened skin barrier lets more water out while letting irritants in, both of which can lead to dryness and sensitivity. By strengthening and reinforcing the skin barrier, CETAPHIL skin care products defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity - dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier.

CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin* *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL moisturizers deliver long lasting hydration to replenish and protect the skin's moisture barrier from dryness. CETAPHIL skincare products are developed with and clinically tested by dermatologists. *IQVIA 2022

For best results, use CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion directly after bathing or washing hands to seal in moisture Skin that is not hydrated enough can become dry, tight and flaky. Enjoy more comfort thanks to CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion, with moisture lock technology instantly soothes and hydrates skin. Even more effective when used directly after bathing, so this nourishing lotion can lock moisture into the skin for lightweight 48 hour hydration, leaving it soft, smooth and protected from dryness. Everyday hydration formulated for your normal to dry skin CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion is uniquely formulated for full body, lightweight hydration. Replenish your skin from day one with this nourishing formula enriched with avocado oil and vitamins E, B3 and B5. This formula is clinically proven to significantly improve the skin’s barrier in 24 hours and completely restore it in just one week. Dermatologist designed for your sensitive skin People of all skin types can benefit from the hydrating action of CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion, even those with sensitive skin. This gentle, non-comedogenic and hypoallergenic formula won't irritate the skin, making it ideal for use as a body or face lotion. Fragrance free and paraben free, the avocado oil and unique ingredient blend of vitamins and glycerin will hydrate sensitive skin without irritation. CETAPHIL Body has a skincare product for every body A daily skin care routine with CETAPHIL moisturizers, designed for your skin type, will help to defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity and leave your skin feeling refreshed and comfortably hydrated. Protect your dry to very dry, sensitive skin with CETAPHIL Moisturizing Cream. This moisture rich, non-greasy, fast absorbing formula is enriched with sweet almond oil and vitamin E to soothe and hydrate your skin. Enjoy 48 hour hydration for your whole body, especially ideal for areas of very dry skin on the hands, feet, elbows and knees.

Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Skin Care Benefit Bar soap gently cleanses face and body without over drying skin Body wash gently cleanses without stripping skin of its natural moisture Lightweight lotion instantly soothes and protects skin from dryness for 48 hours Rich cream hydrates for 48 hours & fully restores skin barrier Ultra lightweight gel formula absorbs instantly to help rescue, prevent and relieve dry, stressed skin Multi-purpose ointment is specially formulated with a high concentration of skin protectant to quickly protect and heal Skin Type Dry to Normal Sensitive Skin Dry to Normal Sensitive Skin Dry to Normal Sensitive Skin Dry to Very Dry, Sensitive Skin Irritated Sensitive Skin Dry, Chapped and Irritated Sensitive Skin Key Ingredients Hydrating Glycerin Aloe Vera, Vitamin B5 Avocado Oil, Essential Vitamins E & B3 and Pre-vitamin B5 Sweet Almond Oil and Vitamins E & B3 and Pre-vitamin B5 Ale Vera, Allantoin and Vitamin E Petroleum, Shea Butter, Vitamin E Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't clog pores (Non-comedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance-free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Lazy Person's Guide to Soft Skin
reviews.reviewText: I'll be honest, I hate moisturizing. It's a sticky, messy affair that always leaves me feeling like a human slug. But alas, my skin craves hydration, and I'm not about to let it turn into a scaly reptile. So, I've been on the hunt for a moisturizer that would actually make me want to moisturize.Enter Cetaphil Body Moisturizer. This fragrance-free, non-greasy lotion is like a miracle in a bottle. It absorbs quickly, leaving no sticky residue behind. And it keeps my skin hydrated for a whopping 48 hours, which means I only have to moisturize every other day.I know what you're thinking: "48 hours? That's not possible!" But it is. I've tested it time and time again, and my skin never feels dry or flaky, even after two days without moisturizer. And OF COURSE I shower daily! After drying off, I'm still hydrated!So, if you're like me and hate moisturizing, but still want soft, smooth skin, then Cetaphil Body Moisturizer is your answer. It's the lazy person's dream come true.P.S. I'm not sure what kind of magic they put in this stuff, but it's definitely worth the effort (or lack thereof) to put on. Your skin will thank you.EDIT: While this is a wonderful moisturizer for the body, I would not use it on the face if you plan to put makeup over it. It has high amounts of silicone and petrolatum, and will cause your makeup to pill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible Value for Such a Big Bottle!
reviews.reviewText: Wow these are a great value. I use this for both my face and my body. It's definitely not the lightest moisturizer out there, but it does feel like it keeps my skin well moisturized. It's not the best feeling moisturizer I have ever used on my face, but overall I think it works quite well and is significantly cheaper as this bottle is about 6-7 times bigger than other facial moisturizers I have purchased around the same price range.I also chose this specific moisturizer because it was indicated from a cosmetic app that there are no harmful chemicals in this specific product. I don't know about other products from this brand, but this moisturizer is a good one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best body and even hand lotion in the market
reviews.reviewText: Been using this brand for almost 2 years now and haven’t found anything that to this levelHighly recommendedAnd it doesn’t leave your skin sticky.Very smooth feeling after

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps my skin
reviews.reviewText: I use this daily on my face along with their facial cleanser. As a total package I would say it works great, but I can't say whether this would work as well on its own. I have sensitive skin and have had no issues with irritation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good moisturizer but no pump
reviews.reviewText: I’m picky with hand moisturizers but this one I really like it doesn’t feel oily or dry or weird like others. Knocked off a star bc inconvenient that it doesn’t have the pump as shown but I’ll survive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good cream helps keep skin from being rough no fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have never been a big fan of most body and facial lotions...until I used this one. Does a great job all over my body and couldn't help but notice I actually did look a little younger....but that wasn't the reason I purchased it. My face is no longer dry and this cream doesn't make my face look red and greasy like all the other lotions did. This product exceeded my expectations and will be sharing this with my friends and family. I am a 64 year old make who wished I tried this product sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this for everyday use. Absorbs easily, leaving skin smooth, not greasy or tacky.
